org.apache.solr.client.solrj.io

Class ParallelStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.client.solrj.io.TupleStream
      • org.apache.solr.client.solrj.io.CloudSolrStream
        • org.apache.solr.client.solrj.io.ParallelStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ParallelStream
extends CloudSolrStream
    The ParallelStream decorates a TupleStream implementation and pushes it to N workers for parallel execution. Workers are chosen from a SolrCloud collection. Tuples that are streamed back from the workers are ordered by a Comparator.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
